title: Days of the past;
author: Shand, Alexander Innes
snippet: It was in this wise. I had a dozen or so of shares in the Union Bank of Scotland, when they fell ominously in a wild burst of panic. With all sorts of sinister rumours in the air, it seemed even betting on a smash.

title: A Tour in Tartan-Land
author: Bede, Cuthbert
snippet: Union Bank of Scotland, modelled after the RomanTemple of Jupiter Stator, at once attracts the eye. George Street is another fine street, and would be stillfiner if the church, that now divides it into two, wasremoved to its extremest point.
